name: part_005
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね誕生日Live2025 】ゲストあり！新衣装お披露目あり！ねねリズムバースデーライブ！【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ hololive 】 [d-Ua7CIU34I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene, in a carrot costume, chooses the next song for the performance.
Nene selects her school uniform outfit for the upcoming group song.
Momosuzu Nene, Houshou Marine, and Aki Rosenthal perform 'Ima wa Ii n da yo.' together.
scenes.song_name: Ima wa Ii n da yo.

scenes.description: Carrot Nene returns to choose her first solo song of the live.
Nene picks a classic idol outfit for her solo performance.
Momosuzu Nene performs her solo song 'Zettai Idol Yamenai de'.

subtitles.original: 水着のねねたちどうだった？
subtitles.english: How did you like the Nenes in swimsuits?

subtitles.original: 次はどんな曲でどんな衣装かな？
subtitles.english: I wonder what the next song and outfit will be.

subtitles.original: ここらへんで落ち着いた曲もいいかもね。
subtitles.english: Maybe a calm song would be nice around here.

subtitles.original: オッケー！この曲に決定！
subtitles.english: Okay! I've decided on this song!

subtitles.original: 次はどの衣装で歌おうかな？
subtitles.english: What outfit should I wear next?

subtitles.original: ちょっと落ち着いた感じがいいな。
subtitles.english: I want something a bit calm.

subtitles.original: この服...あー、ちょっと違うかな？
subtitles.english: This outfit... Oh, maybe not?

subtitles.original: あの服？
subtitles.english: That outfit?

subtitles.original: いやいや、もっと落ち着いた感じの色味...
subtitles.english: No, no, something with a calmer color...

subtitles.original: うーん...
subtitles.english: Hmm...

subtitles.original: あ！この衣装で決定ー！
subtitles.english: Ah! I've decided on this outfit!

subtitles.original: ふーむ...
subtitles.english: Hmm...

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it!

subtitles.original:
今はいいんだよ。
作詞・作曲：MIMI
subtitles.english:
It's Okay For Now.
Lyrics & Music: MIMI

subtitles.original: 朝が怖くて起きられない
subtitles.english: I'm scared of the morning and can't get up

subtitles.original: 努力はそんなに向いていない
subtitles.english: Effort doesn't really suit me

subtitles.original: 泣くことだけが得意になる
subtitles.english: Only crying becomes something I'm good at

subtitles.original: そんな日々の狭間で
subtitles.english: In the gaps of those days

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけ疲れんだって
subtitles.english: I'm just a little tired, I said

subtitles.original: 星の輝きがしんどくて
subtitles.english: The starlight is just too bright

subtitles.original: 言えないことだけ増えてって
subtitles.english: Only the things I can't say keep increasing

subtitles.original: 俯くように
subtitles.english: As if hanging my head

subtitles.original: 明日が明日が来なければ
subtitles.english: If tomorrow, if tomorrow doesn't come

subtitles.original: そうしたらきっと楽になれる
subtitles.english: Then I'm sure it would be easier

subtitles.original: 空っぽなのに心が
subtitles.english: Even though it's empty, my heart

subtitles.original: 痛むんだ
subtitles.english: it hurts

subtitles.original: 今日がどうにも寂しくてさ
subtitles.english: Today is just so lonely

subtitles.original: 眠れないままだ夜だけどさ
subtitles.english: I still can't sleep, though it's night

subtitles.original: いつか幸せって思えるまで
subtitles.english: Until the day I can think I'm happy

subtitles.original: 君は君のままでいてよ
subtitles.english: Just keep being yourself

subtitles.original: もうさ強がらなくてもいいんだよ
subtitles.english: It's okay, you don't have to act tough anymore

subtitles.original: 過去の夜の涙ひとつ
subtitles.english: Every single tear from nights in the past

subtitles.original: それを弱く持って歩いていく
subtitles.english: I'll walk while holding them gently

subtitles.original: それだけで今はいいんだよ
subtitles.english: Just that is okay for now

subtitles.original: いつか君が笑えるような
subtitles.english: So that one day you can smile

subtitles.original: 歌を歌えるのなら
subtitles.english: If I can sing a song like that

subtitles.original: 僕には何もないけど
subtitles.english: I have nothing, but

subtitles.original: 歌を歌えるのなら
subtitles.english: if I can sing a song

subtitles.original: 泣いちゃう傷の数だけ
subtitles.english: For every wound that makes you cry

subtitles.original: 夜は暖かくなるよ
subtitles.english: The night will become warmer

subtitles.original: 君はさ君のままで笑って
subtitles.english: You, just smile while being yourself

subtitles.original: 今日が
subtitles.english: Today...

subtitles.original: 今日がどうにも寂しくてさ
subtitles.english: Today is just so lonely

subtitles.original: 眠れないままだ夜だけどさ
subtitles.english: I still can't sleep, though it's night

subtitles.original: いつか幸せって思えるまで
subtitles.english: Until the day I can think I'm happy

subtitles.original: 君は君のままでいてよ
subtitles.english: Just keep being yourself

subtitles.original: もうさ強がらなくてもいいんだよ
subtitles.english: It's okay, you don't have to act tough anymore

subtitles.original: 過去の夜の涙ひとつ
subtitles.english: Every single tear from nights in the past

subtitles.original: それを弱く持って歩いていく
subtitles.english: I'll walk while holding them gently

subtitles.original: それだけで今はいいんだよ
subtitles.english: Just that is okay for now

subtitles.original: 制服のねねたち可愛かったよね！
subtitles.english: The Nenes in uniforms were cute, weren't they!

subtitles.original: 次はどの曲にしよう？
subtitles.english: Which song should I choose next?

subtitles.original: ゲストは次で最後みたい。
subtitles.english: It seems the next guests will be the last.

subtitles.original: その前に一回ねねのソロを挟んどく？
subtitles.english: Before that, should I squeeze in a Nene solo?

subtitles.original: よし！この曲に決定！
subtitles.english: Alright! I've decided on this song!

subtitles.original: 次はアイドル曲だから、アイドルっぽい衣装で歌いたいな。
subtitles.english: Since the next one is an idol song, I want to sing in an idol-like outfit.

subtitles.original: どの衣装にしようかな？
subtitles.english: Which outfit should I choose?

subtitles.original: あーこれもいいけど...
subtitles.english: Oh, this one's good too, but...

subtitles.original: いやいやこっちでも...
subtitles.english: No, no, this way...

subtitles.original: いやいやこの服...
subtitles.english: No, no, this outfit...

subtitles.original: いやこっち！
subtitles.english: No, this one!

subtitles.original: この衣装に決定ー！
subtitles.english: I've decided on this outfit!

subtitles.original: 着替えますよー！
subtitles.english: I'm changing!

subtitles.original: 行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: みんな聞いてねー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please listen!

subtitles.original: 輝いてる君を見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see you shining

subtitles.original: もうずっとずっとずっとステージにいて
subtitles.english: Please stay on the stage forever, and ever, and ever

subtitles.original:
絶対アイドル辞めないで
作詞：指原莉乃 / 作曲：小池竜暉 / 菊池博人
subtitles.english:
Never Stop Being an Idol
Lyrics: Sashihara Rino / Music: Koike Ryuki / Kikuchi Hiroto
